modelHint: Only available for Claude Code environments, choose the model version to use
modelLockedInPlanMode: Model locked to Opus in plan mode
planModeHint: When enabled, Claude will create a plan before executing tasks
executionTimeHint: If no execution time is set, the conversation will be executed immediately
shortcut: Press Ctrl/Cmd + Enter to send quickly
taskCompletedMessage: Cannot send new conversations for completed or cancelled tasks
hasPendingMessage: Cannot send new messages while there are pending or running conversations
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone.

noSelection.title: Select a conversation
noSelection.description: Choose a conversation from the left to view execution logs

execution.title: Execution Details
execution.subtitle: Task execution information and logs
execution.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this execution? This action cannot be undone.
execution.retry_confirm: Are you sure you want to retry this execution? This will start a new execution process.

noWorkBranch.title: No work branch created yet
noWorkBranch.description: Git changes will be displayed after task execution

noCommitHash.title: No commit hash available
noCommitHash.description: Unable to display git changes because commit hash is not available

details.title: Conversation Details
details.description: View conversation information and execution results
details.noResultDescription: This conversation has not been executed or execution failed

logs.title: Execution Logs
logs.authError: Authentication failed. Please check your login status.
logs.authRequired: Authentication required. Please log in first.
logs.noLogs: No logs available. Click Start to begin streaming.

delete.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This action cannot be undone and will reset the git repository to the previous commit.

attachment.supported_formats: Images (JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP) and PDF files up to 10MB
attachment.unsupported_file_type: Only images and PDF files are supported
attachment.conversation_required: Please create a conversation first to upload attachments
attachment.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this attachment? This action cannot be undone.
attachment.file_not_found: Attachment file not found on disk
